memberdef.name: s_clk_pll_div_map
memberdef.initializer: = { {0xFF, 1}, {pllctlv2_pll0, pllctlv2_clk0}, {pllctlv2_pll0, pllctlv2_clk1}, {pllctlv2_pll1, pllctlv2_clk0}, {pllctlv2_pll1, pllctlv2_clk1}, {pllctlv2_pll1, pllctlv2_clk2}, {pllctlv2_pll2, pllctlv2_clk0}, {pllctlv2_pll2, pllctlv2_clk1}, }

briefdescription.para: Get Clock frequency for IP in common group.
